description.hltext_display: How to be energy smart this summer
description.content:
© iStockphoto.com/Maksud_kr
ALMOST 50 per cent of energy use in summer can be attributed to air conditioning and refrigeration, according to Ergon Energy.
While both appliances are necessary during the hotter months, making some small changes can save you money on your electricity bill and reduce your carbon footprint, the energy provider says.
By setting your air conditioner to an energy-efficient 25 degrees and turning off that second fridge, you can significantly cut your electricity costs during the summer months.
Ergon Energy's tips to reduce your energy consumption this summer include:
Install the correct-sized air conditioner for the space you want to cool and consult a qualified air-conditioning contractor to ensure your unit has optimum capacity.
Select the air ‘recirculate’ setting. Otherwise you will be drawing in warmer air from the outside and using a lot of electricity to cool your space down.
Choose curtains and blinds with lighter colours and pale linings to keep the ambient temperature of the room down and you might not need to turn on your aircon as often.
Open up your home to create cross breezes instead of switching on your aircon.
Try a fan, combined with the doors and windows open, before switiching on your aircon.

description.hltext_display: Klima-Gerechtigkeit darf nicht nur Phrase sein
description.content:
Die 15. UN-Klimakonferenz ist Geschichte, und leider wurde in Cancún – nach Posen und Kopenhagen – wieder nur ein Minimalkonsens erreicht. Eine mehr als schwache Geste gegenüber den Ländern des Südens, die erwiesenermaßen am meisten von den negativen Auswirkungen unseres Lebens- und Wirtschaftsstils betroffen sind. Schwere Stürme, Starkregen und Überschwemmungen haben heuer bereits zahlreiche Länder wie die Philippinen, Guatemala, China, Thailand oder Kolumbien heimgesucht. Mit tragischen Folgen wie Ernteausfälle, Verlust an Biodiversität und Wasserknappheit – ganz abgesehen von den humanitären Folgen.Zur Abmilderung solcher Anpassungsmaßnahmen in Entwicklungsländern wurde in Cancún ein Hilfsfonds gegründet. Allerdings gibt es bis dato keine finanziellen Zusagen der Industriestaaten. Die Finanzierungsfrage wurde beim Thema Waldschutz ebenso auf 2011 verschoben. Zudem wird den indigenen Völkern weniger Schutz als erwartet zugesprochen.
Klimaschutz und Nachhaltigkeit sind bereits zu gängigen Begriffen geworden, doch wenige sehen die Notwendigkeit, auch die Rechte jener Menschen, die die Auswirkungen am unmittelbarsten spüren, einzuhalten! Leben, Gesundheit, Nahrung, Wasser und Wohnung sind völkerrechtlich garantierte Menschenrechte, die den Ländern des Südens oft vorenthalten werden.
Zu oft ignorieren wir Landrechte, bedienen wir uns wie selbstverständlich an den Flächen, die wir zum Anbau unserer erneuerbaren Energien verwenden, und beeinträchtigen damit die Lebensgrundlage der dort lebenden Menschen massiv. Für viele von ihnen bleibt als Ausweg nur die Migration in Länder, die sie nicht willkommen heißen, die zugleich aber maßgebliche Verursacher des Klimawandels sind. Wir geben wenig zurück, aber uns läuft allen die Zeit davon! Ohne einen gesellschaftlichen Wandel wird es auch bei uns nicht gehen.
Hervorzuheben ist der Einsatz von kirchlichen Organisationen, die weltweit ihr Möglichstes tun, um den Menschen vor Ort direkte Hilfe zu leisten.
Die internationale Politik lässt sich Zeit. Dies ist jedoch keine Ausrede, um im eigenen Land mit den Bemühungen nachzulassen. Leider fällt Österreich auch durch die drastische Kürzung des Budgets für Entwicklungszusammenarbeit negativ auf. Österreich wird damit das UN-Ziel, bis 2015 0,7 Prozent des Bruttonationaleinkommens in Entwicklungshilfe zu investieren, voraussichtlich verfehlen.
Umso mehr müssen wir an unseren nationalen Zielen arbeiten, um nicht die Menschen in den Entwicklungsländern im Stich zu lassen. Es geht um Verantwortung für unsere Nächsten, für unsere Nachkommen und für die Schöpfung. Unsere Zukunft entscheidet sich auf diesem Wege!
Ludwig Schwarz ist römisch-katholischer Bischof von Linz.

description.hltext_display: Polis sköt ner angripande man
description.content:
Kåge Plötsligt rusade den 40-årige beväpnade mannen ut ur bostaden mot poliserna. Då avfyrade polisen flera skott mot mannen. Så slutade nattens drama i Kåge.Relaterade artiklar Peder Jonsson, pressansvarig vid Västerbottenspolisen, berättar för Norran att dramat inleddes vid 02-tiden då den 40-årige mannens son ringde till polisen om att det var en hotfull situation i bostaden.
En polispatrull skickades till platsen, men mannen vägrade komma ut ur bostaden. I samband med detta kunde också barnet lämna bostaden.
Ingen gisslan Som jag uppfattar det har det aldrig varit någon gisslansituation mellan pappan och barnet, säger Peder Jonsson.
Polisen valde att kalla in de speciella förhandlare som finns inom polismyndigheten. De kallas in vid den här typen av svåra situationer, säger Peder Jonsson.
Mannen rusade ut
Vid 06.30-tiden förändades läget dramatiskt: Plötsligt kom mannen utrusande från bostaden mot de poliser som fanns utanför. Mannen var beväpnad och patrullen hamnade i en nödvärnssituation och avlossnade därför fler än ett skott, berättar Peder Jonsson.
Mannen träffades i de nedre delarna av kroppen. Mannens minderårige barn fanns alltså inte kvar på plats när skotten avlossades.
Inte livshotande
Mannen är förd till sjukhus för vård. Skadorna ska enligt preliminära uppgifter ej vara livs-hotande.
Platsen för händelsen är nu avspärrad och polisens tekniker är på väg till platsen. Den här typen av händelser, när poliser avfyrar sina tjänstevapen, innebär också att det redan nu anmälts för internutredning, påpekar Peder Jonsson.
Varför avlossades skotten? Polispatrullen kände sig hotad, och mannen var beväpnad. Jag vill dock inte säga på vilket sätt mannen beväpnat sig, svarar Peder Jonsson.
Hörde du eller såg du något från nattens händelser? Mejla oss på redaktion@norran.se eller ring 0910-57800

description.hltext_display: Feds Plan To Sell Stock In AIG
description.content: [NEW YORK] - Two large stock sales are in the works involving AIG. The U.S. Treasury Department plans to sell a piece of its stake in American International Group next year. Any remaining stock will be sold in 2012. AIG received a 182-billion-dollar bailout package from the government during the financial crisis. The feds hope to turn a profit on the bailout with the stock sale. The government will own over 90-percent of AIG by the end of the first quarter. The sale would signal a major step in getting the government out of its investment in AIG.

description.hltext_display: 振东制药：主力品种成长空间较大，产品梯队丰富
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content: .source } .source *} .article *} .article .slipcont } .dp_tab02 } .dp_tab02 *} .dp_tab02 td} .dp_tab02 th} .dp_tab02 th.pd10} .dp_tab02 a} .slipcont a} .clear} 招商证券：李珊珊 徐列海 2010-12-22 评级类别无 EPS预测2010年 2011年 2012年 成长性10-11年 11-12年 评级变动无 58.46% 32.04% 报告日昨收盘价: 目标价:41.2 上涨空间: 价值评级公司合理估值 36.1~41.2 元。 以抗肿瘤中成药为核心产品的国家高新技术企业：公司主要从事中药、化药 制剂的研发、生产和销售，产品线覆盖抗肿瘤、心脑血管及抗感染用药等， 以“岩舒注射液”为核心产品，是山西省长治市首家获批的高新技术企业。 目前公司拥有三大生产基地，41 条生产线，11 大剂型，359 个品种。实际控 制人为董事长李安平，发行后持股 57.8%。部分高管持有公司股权。 主导产品岩舒注射液成长空间较大：岩舒注射液为纯中药抗癌制剂，主要用 于治疗癌症痛疼和止血，为国家中药二级保护品种，医保乙类。09 年收入 3.7 亿元，毛利率达 95.5%，收入、毛利占比 71%和 87%，母公司销售费率约 62%。 岩舒适用于大部分实体瘤，应用范围广，日使用金额低于竞争品种；公司 08 年开始技术升级研究项目，是唯一通过卫生部、科技部“重大新药创制”科 技重大专项“十一查看详情

description.hltext_display: 年底投資者慎選貨幣型基金
description.content: 伴隨著年底各家基金公司排名大戰即將開打，貨幣型基金作為短期理財產品，通常被基金公司用做迅速抬高規模排名的工具，業內人士表示，� 大量資金短期高度聚集，不可能尋找到有效投資標的來滿足這些資金投資需求，只能是大量攤薄原持有人利益，在這一攤薄過程中，新持有人利益也未能最大化，這也是新年后貨幣型基金收益大多不伴隨著年底各家基金公司排名大戰即將開打，貨幣型基金作為短期理財產品，通常被基金公司用做迅速抬高規模排名的工具，業內人士表示，� 大量資金短期高度聚集，不可能尋找到有效投資標的來滿足這些資金投資需求，只能是大量攤薄原持有人利益，在這一攤薄過程中，新持有人利益也未能最大化，這也是新年后貨幣型基金收益大多不如人意重要原� 之一。據羊城晚� �12月22日� �導，伴隨著年底各家基金公司排名大戰即將開打，貨幣型基金作為短期理財產品，� 其低風險、低交易費用等特點，通常被基金公司用做迅速抬高公司規模排名的工具，而今年由於銀行與券商也紛紛看好這一產品的規模空間，在年底� 入戰團。� 此，投資者面對各類游說，務必保持清醒的� �腦，不要盲目聽信部分營銷人員的推薦，而喪失自己最好的投資機會。 貨幣基金成調節規模利器從往年的經驗看，每到年底，不少基金公司就會利用低風險的產品，動員客戶短期認購來迅速提高自己在業內的規模排名。今年，貨幣型基金的爭奪戰在11月份便悄然打響。巨靈數據顯示，貨幣市� �基金上個月一共發行了3只，總共發行了120.65億份，平均規模達到了60.2億份，大大超過了前三個季度貨幣基金的平均發行規模。數據顯示，今年前三季度總共發行了4只貨幣基金，總規模為147.83億元，平均每只貨幣基金的發行規模不足37億份。但一進入第四季度，平均發行規模便暴增62％，可見基金公司在年關將近時對貨幣基金的重視。實際上，基金公司利用貨幣基金沖規模排名這一做法，� 為嚴重損害了投資者的利益，今年已經被上海證監局明確叫停。� 為大量資金短期的高度聚集，實際上� �本不可能尋找到有效的投資標的來滿足這些資金的投資需求，� 此只能是大量攤薄原持有人的利益，但是在這一攤薄的過程中，新持有人的利益也未能最大化。這也是新年后貨幣型基金收益大多不如人意的重要原� 之一。銀行券商� 入競爭雖然基金公司依� 貨幣基金沖規模的沖動有所減少，但是銀行由於吸儲的需要以及券商也開始意識到這一產品良好的蓄水� 作用，� 此銀行與券商兩大金融機構今年也開始落力在貨幣型產品上角逐。據了解，目前各家銀行都有各自的與貨幣基金類似的理財產品，不過門檻較高，起點基本在5萬元以上，年化收益率差不多在1.5％左右。比如中國銀行日積月累和招商銀行日日金的� �期年化收益率在1.55％左右，工商銀行靈通快線以及建設銀行等銀行的產品均為1.45％的年化收益率。年關將近，不少銀行不停地游說客戶將閑置資金換成短期貨幣類理財產品。像招商銀行，幾乎每周都會向其高端客戶發送短信建議客戶買入。而過去一向大雞不食細米的券商，近來也開始不斷� 大對貨幣型理財產品的投入。其中尤以國泰君安證券公司最為積極。該公司管理的君得利一號的業績，由於平均年化收益率高達3.5％，遙遙� �先於銀行的短期理財產品以及貨幣基金，其規模已達50億元上限。為此，近期該公司又推出君得利二號，大力游說客戶進行認購。如果該公司此產品能� 如期實現10億元的發行目標，該券商一家公司的貨幣型產品規模便可超越絕大多數的基金公司，進入排名前五。對於金融機構出於自身目的的推薦，投資者需要保持一份清醒，慎重選擇真正適合自己的理財產品，不宜盲目重金買入此類產品。(黃俊舒 編輯)

description.hltext_display: '황해' 터졌다…개봉 동시에 예매율 1위 흥행 예고
description.content:
올 겨울 최대의 기대작으로 자리매김하며 공개와 동시에 웰메이드 영화라는 찬사를 한 몸에 받고 있는 영화 ‘황해’가 22일 개봉했다. 모두의 기다림을 입증하듯 개봉과 동시에 전 예매 사이트에서 개봉작 예매율 1위를 석권하며 연말 극장가에 거침없는 흥행돌풍을 시작했다. 영진위 통합전산망(21.96%), 맥스무비(25.29%), YES24(17.74%), 인터파크(23.7%), 네이트(37.80%), 티켓링크(22.39%)<22일 오전 10시 30분 기준> 등 모든 예매사이트에서 ‘헬로우 고스트’, ‘쓰리데이즈’ 등의 동일 개봉작들을 넘고 예매율 1위를 휩쓴 것.
이는 치밀한 연출력의 나홍진 감독과 완벽한 연기를 선보이는 두 배우 하정우, 김윤석이 만들어낸 최고의 시너지를 통해 언론과 평단을 사로잡은 결과. ‘황해’는 “‘추격자’보다 2배 강해진 액션-스릴-드라마를 가진 작품이다”, “숨 돌릴 틈 없는 긴장감 팽팽한 치밀한 액션 세공품을 보는 듯 하다” 등의 호평을 이끌어내며 입소문에 박차를 가하고 있다.
특히 ‘황해’는 “한국 영화의 힘을 보여주는 영화다. 최고다(배우 설경구)”, “영화사에 남을 작품이다(배우 정진영)” 등과 같은 관람 소감처럼 개봉과 함께 입소문을 통해 현재 극장가를 장악한 ‘해리포터와 죽음의 성물- 1부’의 질주를 꺾을 예정이다. 청소년 관람불가라는 조건에서도 예매율 1위를 차지했다는 점에서 의미를 더한다. 배급사 관계자는 “‘황해’의 흥행 스타트는 이런 기세라면 청소년 관람 불가라는 등급에도 500만은 충분히 넘을 수 있을 것으로 예상된다”고 전망했다.
언론과 평단의 극찬을 넘어서 개봉과 함께 대한민국 영화계의 또 한 번의 센세이션이 불어올 것을 알린 ‘황해’는 2010년 연말부터 2011년까지 박스오피스에서 독보적인 입지를 굳히며 흥행 돌풍을 이끌어 갈 것이다.

description.hltext_display: NATAŠA BEKVALAC: NISAM LJUTA NA SEVERINU
description.content:
Nataša Bekvalac je u emisiji „Ekskluziv“ na TV Prva izjavila da joj ne smeta što se njena prijateljica Severina Vučković na promociji svog DVD našalila na njen račun. Hrvatica je, napravivši aluziju na Natašin sukob sa Sergejom Trifunovićem, voditelju Ivanu Ivanoviću rekla:
- Znaš šta treba da jedeš, ja ne želim ovakvu najavu.
Lepa Novosađanka joj na tome nije zamerila.
- Jedna rečenica može da se tumači na mnogo načina, u zavisnosti od toga kakva ste osoba. Ja znam da je ona divna i plemenita, i ne vidim ništa loše u tome. Ništa joj ne zameram - rekla je Nataša.
(V. Đ.)
Vesti: severina, Nataša Bekvalac, Ekskluzivni intervju

description.hltext_display: Cuba expects to receive 2.5 million tourists in 2010
description.content:
Cuban authorities plan to conclude 2010 with a total of 2.5 million tourists, with an expected growth of 10 percent in the number of tourists for 2011, a senior official of the Ministry of Tourism (Mintur) said on Tuesday; Kazinform refers to Xinhua.
Commercial Director of Mintur Jose Manuel Bisbe said that a total of 2.4 million tourists have visited the nation this year by Tuesday, and the number is expected to reach 2.5 million by the end of 2010. He considered the figure satisfactory given the situation in other countries.
The official stated that Cuba hopes to welcome 2.7 million visitors in 2011. He described the goal as "ambitious" but not unattainable considering the current conditions in local tourism.
"We are not so far away from the goal of 3 million visitors to Cuba per year," Bisbe said.
Cuba has over 56,000 hotel rooms, most of them in the capital and in Varadero.
According to Bisbe, visitors are mainly from Canada, Italy, Germany, Spain, France, Russia, Argentina and Mexico; Kazinform cites Xinhua.
See www.xinhuanat.com/english2010 for full version

description.hltext_display: Eine Strafe mit Fantasie
description.content:
Ein Fußballspiel entfällt, da die Partie wegen Sicherheitsbedenken auf der Heimstätte des Gastgebers untersagt wird. Die Heimmannschaft sieht sich außerstande, einen Ersatzspielort aufzutreiben oder einem Platztausch zuzustimmen. Der Heimverein tritt mit Verweis auf den Behördenbescheid nicht an. Es handelt sich um die Regionalliga-Partie Union Innsbruck gegen Austria Salzburg. Der Tiroler Strafsenat bestraft Austria Salzburg. Das Spiel wird mit 3:0 für Union Innsbruck gewertet, für Salzburg gibt es eine Geldstrafe. Das bemerkenswerte an diesem Urteil ist, dass es sich um eine Präventivstrafe handelt. Schließlich geht es um ein Spiel, das nie stattgefunden hat. Verhandelt wurden quasi mögliche Ausschreitungen. So riecht das Urteil nach Willkür.
Kommentare zum Artikel:
21.12.2010 20:44:41 skandalurteil aus tirol!
Sollten solche urteile auf die bundesliga überschlagen würde sich vielleicht rapid überlegen nach ried zu kommen u.auch lieber 3 punkte kassieren. War immer im glauben das die tiroler loiale leute sind aber man ksnnsich auch täuschen!
walter lindinger

description.hltext_display: 女子莫名送包的哥被迫苦寻
description.content:
的哥李用江万万没有想到，女乘客下车甩下一句话：“我的包内物品价值一两万元，送给你吧。”说完，对方没有撕车票便扬长而去，全然不顾李师傅在后面大声叫喊着要还包……
昨日上午，李师傅向记者讲述了那一幕。18日凌晨，他驾驶车牌号为陕AU××89的出租车行驶到西京医院附近时，只见一男一女结伴而来，其中这名20岁的女孩茫茫（化名）拦住了李师傅的车，上车后对他说：“送我到公安局。”这让李师傅有些匪夷所思。此时，站在车外的男子把一个包递给在车上的茫茫，不料茫茫又把包扔给该男子，最后该男子把包放进车内后走了，茫茫显得很生气。一路上，李师傅不停地安慰茫茫，当出租车行驶到尚勤路附近时，茫茫要求下车，下车后也不撕车票，而是对司机李师傅说：“我包内的东西价值一两万元，送给你吧！”任凭李师傅如何叫喊也不回头，由于当时遇到红灯，李师傅无法前行寻找，等绿灯亮了后，却不见了茫茫的身影。
“我觉得这个女孩可能是生病了，挺可怜的。”李师傅说，第二天一早他把包交给了所在车队西安伊兰汽车有限公司。据工作人员田女士介绍，他们发现包内有个名牌电脑以及手机，随后看到该手机上存有“妈妈”字样的电话号码，便跟茫茫的母亲取得联系。
昨日，茫茫的舅舅拿着相关证件前去该车队领走了茫茫故意扔下的包：“茫茫是陕北人，如今生病了，神经有点异常，正在医院接受治疗，她的母亲在照顾她。那个看他打车的男子是她原来的男朋友，不过现在已经不联系了……真的太感谢李师傅了，孩子说把包送给李师傅了，李师傅却不要，还在寻找主人……”临走时，茫茫的舅舅给李师傅留下100元钱表示感谢。

description.hltext_display: Predators prepare for tough stretch
description.content:
Playing back-to-back games is part of life in the NHL. For the Predators, however, it's almost become a way of life.
Nashville will be in the Windy City today to take on the Chicago Blackhawks before playing host to the Ottawa Senators on Thursday at Bridgestone Arena.
In all, the Predators will play back-to-back games eight times in their first 41 games, and only five back-to-back sets in the final 41.
"Lucky us," forward Joel Ward quipped.
Back-to-back games are usually back-loaded on the schedule, but scheduling and travel quirks don't always make that possible. Still, the Predators have fared well. They are 4-2-0 in the first game of back-to-back sets, 3-2-1 in the second.
Perhaps their best effort came two weeks into the season. On Oct. 23, the Predators won 1-0 at Dallas, then traveled to Tampa Bay for a 5 p.m. game the next day and picked up a 4-3 victory.
"That was tough," Coach Barry Trotz said. "But it's a reality in hockey. You have to be mentally tough and be ready to go."
Many of the veteran players said they look forward to back-to-back games, as long as the sets are not compressed too closely together.
"You look forward to getting back into the rink, especially if you win," Ward said. "If you lose, you want to get back out there and redeem yourself."
Predators players and coaches said the first five to 10 minutes of the second game is crucial in being successful when playing consecutive games in consecutive nights. An example came on Saturday. The Predators were coming off a 3-1 win at New Jersey on Friday, but returned home and lost 6-1 to Los Angeles.
"That was evident just watching Saturday's game," Trotz said. "They jumped on us in the first shift. They had three goals in the first 10 minutes of the game. Mentally, it's real hard to recover."
As it pertains to second games, the players said they try to use their minds to trick their bodies into not being exhausted.
"It definitely takes a toll on your body, but at the same time that's why we train hard in the offseason," forward Jordin Tootoo said. "I think mentally we're all ready for it, and physically as well."
Rinne ready: No. 1 goaltender Pekka Rinne, who missed eight games after having his left knee scoped, was removed from injured reserve Tuesday.
He practiced well, and Trotz said he expects Rinne to play in one of the next two games.
"I thought he moved extremely well," Trotz said. "The problem is we haven't had a lot of actual practices, other than a couple of guys shooting on him. … He's enthused. He seems to be very confident in everything he is capable of doing."
Legwand out: Forward David Legwand (lower body) attempted to practice Monday but left the ice early.
He did not practice with the team Tuesday.
Trotz said Legwand would miss the next two games and probably the Dec. 26 game against St. Louis.

It definitely takes a toll on your body, but at the same time that's why we train hard in the offseason; I think mentally we're all ready for it, and physically as well.

description.hltext_display: 上海天膠指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
Brother of missing cyclist seeks help
description.content:
A MAN is appealing for help finding his brother who vanished on a cycling trip in northern NSW two months ago, saying his disappearance is tearing their family apart.
Adrian Trevett, 62, was driven to Jackadgery, 115km northeast of Glen Innes, by a female friend on October 28, 2010.
The Glen Innes fruit and vegetable seller spent the night at a caravan park in Mann River and set out on his bike the next day for the summit of the Gibraltar Range.
Searches were carried out when Mr Trevett failed to return, but police have failed to find any trace of him.
On Wednesday, his brother Valentine Trevett appealed for anyone who might have information to come forward.
"My brother is a valued and well respected member of our family and is dearly missed by all his relatives and friends," he said in a statement issued by police.
"He has worked hard all his life and contributed to our lives in a myriad of different ways.
"Not hearing from him for so long and having no idea of his whereabouts is tearing us apart."
Phone calls and other attempts to contact Adrian Trevett have gone unanswered.
"It's got to the point where we have serious concerns for Adrian's welfare and safety," his brother said.
"Please, if you know where he is or what has happened to him since that Friday in October, come forward and speak with police."
Adrian Trevett is described as being of Caucasian appearance, with olive skin, about 170cm tall and with a solid build.

event_or_fact.property: My brother is a valued and well respected member of our family and is dearly missed by all his relatives and friends
Not hearing from him for so long and having no idea of his whereabouts is tearing us apart.

description.hltext_display: Council rejects Mayor Cicchinelli's proposed $37.4 million budget (4)
description.content:
MASSILLON, OH —
Six weeks of discussion and debate over the city’s 2011 finances has left Massillon City Council no closer to a balanced budget.
During its regular meeting Monday, council voted 5-4 against Mayor Frank Cicchinelli’s proposed $37.4 million budget for 2011. Council members Gary Anderson, Kathy Catazaro-Perry, Donnie Peters, Larry Slagle and Tony Townsend voted against the ordinance.
Council now has until Jan. 7 – the first 2011 pay period for city employees – to pass a balanced budget either temporary or permanent. Council’s next regular session is set for Jan. 3.
Paul Manson, chair of the finance committee, was both frustrated and disappointed to see the budget voted down and said he believed the reasons for voting down the proposed 2011 budget were purely political.
“They are trying to duck responsibility,” Manson said following Monday’s meeting. “They made the decision to vote it down because it was easy.”
The budget voted down Monday included $16 million in the city’s general fund – a figure that the county auditor has certified. The $16 million, however, is not enough to operate the city departments – including police and fire – supported by the general fund dollars.
To balance the proposed budget, specifically the general fund, Cicchinelli chose to under-fund the police and fire departments by $1.2 million each, a practice that has drawn criticism in years past.
He was not in attendance at Monday’s meeting.
The proposed budget had also accounted for 4 percent raises for city workers and 1 percent raises for some elected officials including the mayor, auditor, treasurer, law director, council president and nine members of council.
Council did not discuss the budget prior to or after voting on the ordinance.
Manson said that any budget approved before Jan. 7 will likely contain figures very similar to those in the budget council voted down. The only difference is that a temporary budget would only account for the first quarter of the 2011 calendar year.
Council will meet in a work session at 6 p.m. Monday. The budget issue could be discussed, but Manson said he doubts that much would be accomplished in a single discussion. Council voted on the ordinance following its third reading Monday, but Manson contends there was too little discussion in the six weeks leading up to that vote.
“So far there has been a lot of rhetoric,” Manson said, “but no questions of any substance.”ђ

event_or_fact.property: there was too little discussion in the six weeks leading up to that vote
he doubts that much would be accomplished in a single discussion
any budget approved before Jan. 7 will likely contain figures very similar to those in the budget council voted down.

06:05:02ŠTA ME NERVIRA U BEOGRADU! (0) Sreda, 22. Decembar, 2010.| Autor: Agencija BETA
BEOGRAD - Dinar je danas jači prema evru za 0,1 odsto, tako da zvanični srednji kurs iznosi 106,4365 dinara za jedan evro, objavila je Narodna banka Srbije (NBS).
NBS je juče prodala 20 miliona evra da bi ublažio prekomerne dnevne oscilacije kursa. Prema zvaničnom srednjem kursu, evro danas košta oko deset para manje nego u utorak kada je srednji kurs bio 106,5390 dinara za jedan evro.
Od početka godine NBS je prodala ukupno dve milijarde i 509,7 miliona evra, uključujući jučerašnju intervenciju, a kupio 126 miliona evra. Dinar je ove godine bio najjači 4. januara, kada je zvanični srednji kurs iznosio 95,9679 dinara za jedan evro, a najslabiji 4. novembra, kada je zvanični srednji kurs iznosio 107,5216 dinara za jedan evro.

description.hltext_display: Feine Ironie oder schlicht jenseitig?
description.content:
Österreich steht möglicherweise kurz vor einem großen Aufbegehren seiner Bürger. Findet zumindest der ORF. Reale Anzeichen dafür sind leider Fehlanzeige.
Preisfrage ohne Preis: Was haben der Präsident der Arbeiterkammer, ein ehemaliger Vizekanzler, ein ehemaliger EU-Landwirtschaftskommissar, der Präsident des Gemeindebundes und eine Ex-Vorsitzende der Hochschülerschaft gemeinsam?
Einiges natürlich. Immerhin stammen Herbert Tumpel, Hannes Androsch, Franz Fischler, Helmut Mödlhammer und Barbara Blaha ausnahmslos aus dem ausschließlich rot-schwarzen Biotop, das Politik und Verbände dieser Republik seit ewigen Zeiten in eisernen Händen hält.
Um genau diese fünf zweifelsfrei höchst ehrenwerten Persönlichkeiten zu einer TV-Debatte über "das große Aufbegehren der ‚Bürgergesellschaft‘" einzuladen, wie dies der ORF am Sonntagabend tat, muss man entweder über einen bemerkenswert feinen Sinn für Ironie oder aber ein völlig jenseitiges Verständnis von Bürgergesellschaft haben (vielleicht schreibt auch deshalb der ORF den Begriff unter Anführungszeichen).
Viel spricht leider für Letzteres, denn von einer ironischen Annäherung an die typisch österreichische Interpretation von Bürgergesellschaft war im Verlauf der Sendung nichts zu bemerken. Konsequenterweise hätte das Thema der Sendung daher lauten müssen: "Warum ist in Österreich
eine von den Parteien und Pflichtmitgliedschaftsverbänden unabhängige Bürgergesellschaft strukturell unmöglich?" Dazu hätten die geladenen Damen und Herren zweifellos einiges beitragen können. Umso bemerkenswerter die These der Polit-Beobachter vom Küniglberg, die glauben, einen "großen Aufstand der ‚Bürgergesellschaft‘" konstatieren zu können.
Interessanter wäre es da schon, den Ursachen für dessen Ausbleiben auf den Grund zu gehen. Tatsächlich entlädt sich die Unzufriedenheit der sogenannten einfachen Bürger dieses Landes vorzugsweise in der einfachsten Variante: In schlechten Zensuren für die p.t. Regierenden. Das geht ohne großes eigenes Engagement, weil ohnehin die diversen Umfrageinstitute ständig auf der Suche nach Auskunftswilligen sind.
Jenseits derartiger rhetorischer Empörungsarbeit ist die politische Kultur der heimischen Bürgerschaft auf strikte, fast schon mönchische Enthaltsamkeit gepolt. Die hartnäckige Entmündigungsstrategie des österreichischen Verbändestaates und ihre Form der totalen Repräsentation bleibt eben nicht ohne Folgen.
*
Wiens Grüne wissen, auf welches politische Mammutprojekt samt erheblichem Absturzpotenzial sie sich mit der rot-grünen Rathaus-Koalition eingelassen haben. Immerhin zählten sie in den vergangenen Jahren zu den schärfsten Kritikern der alleinregierenden Roten. Das soll und muss sich jetzt allerdings in kürzester Zeit ändern.
Mit Gespür für Selbstironie bringt das Thomas Blimlinger, der grüne Bezirksvorsteher von Wien-Neubau, in seinen Weihnachtswünschen auf den Punkt: "Die schärfsten Kritiker der Elche sind jetzt plötzlich selber welche." Und auf der Innenseite der Karte haben sich zwei Rentiere ganz doll lieb – das eine mit roter, das andere mit grüner Nase ...
Mehr Pathos wirft demgegenüber der ÖAAB in die weihnachtliche Waagschale. Die schwarzen Arbeitnehmervertreter verschickten eine DVD des Hollywood-Rührstücks "Das Streben nach Glück" mit Superstar Will Smith in der Hauptrolle. In dieser nach einer wahren Begebenheit verfilmten Geschichte kämpft sich ein alleinerziehender Vater durch einen widrigen Alltag. Selbstredend mit Happy End.

description.hltext_display: 打造特色碑林迎接世园盛会
description.content:
昨日上午，“携手推进碑林市容环卫建设・果皮箱配置和保洁服发放”仪式，在碑林区政府大楼内举行。碑林区委书记史晓红、区长董劲威等有关领导和碑林区100名保洁员代表参加发放仪式。通过价值250万元的果皮箱配置和保洁服发放等举措，从而减轻保洁员的劳动强度，进一步提高全区大环境保障力度，推进碑林“五宜城区”建设，促进西安建设国际化大都市和迎接2011年世园会的重要工作。
今年7月份，碑林区按照西安市市容园林局关于在一二类主干道设置安装新型高档果皮箱工作要求，提出果皮箱配置和保洁员保洁服配备工作设想。
经过多次商量后，决定由区城改办牵头筹集资金，区市容园林局落实果皮箱、保洁服建设项目。决定形成后，区城改办积极动员辖区范围内热心公益事业的房地产公司支持碑林区市容环卫建设，兰蒂斯城、紫落澜亭、伊顿公馆、长安大街三号等楼盘的20家房地产公司积极捐赠资金共计250万元。
经多次研究，190万元用于购买安装新型高档果皮箱2000个，60万元用于全区保洁员购置春秋装、夏装、马甲保洁服6000套。另外区财政再拿出73万元，购置近1000个果皮箱，总计全区配置安装3000个新型高档果皮箱。
截至目前，已在含光路、太白北路、朱雀大街、太乙路、兴庆路、友谊路、南二环等95条道路上安装1800个果皮箱，剩余1200个果皮箱本月底前安装到位，6000套保洁服从昨日开始陆续发放到全区保洁员手中。
一年时间内 提升三大步
一是发展壮大行业装备。区财政投资640万元，新购置环卫、绿化各种车辆近百台，增强了市容环卫园林机械化作业力量，提高了处理重大问题和应对复杂局面的能力。
二是推进市容环卫园林建设。去冬今春以来，新建4个绿化小广场，建成屋顶绿化7处，创建园林式单位8家。今冬至明年春季，将新建2座绿化小广场，建成11家单位屋顶，创建4家园林式单位。
三是创新长效管理机制。碑林区积极探索建立了具有碑林特色的市容早报告早检查早处理工作机制、包片包街承包工作机制、日检查周通报月评比工作机制、道路人工清扫机扫冲洒水作业机制、公厕六字标准化管理法、渣土清运五字管理模式，取得了突破性的提升，园林绿化荣获省绿化委授予的陕西省绿化先进，建筑垃圾清运秩序管理迈入全市先进行列。在昨日的发放仪式结束后，因为今日是冬至，为此，碑林区市容园林局为全区每位保洁员发放1份水饺。

description.hltext_display: Pet crocodile prompts legal battle
description.content:
A Queensland man is fighting to keep a pet croc that's been part of his family for almost 50 years.
Related links
A NORTH Queensland man is braced for a legal battle to keep a beloved pet croc that's been part of his family for almost 50 years.
John Casey, 49, was just two years old when Charlie joined the family as a six-inch hatchling after her mother was shot by a hunter in 1963.
His late father Alf lovingly hand reared the estuarine croc, taking her for walks in the north Queensland town of Proserpine, down the pub for a beer, to school fetes and even a ball.
"My father used to just let her walk in front of him down the street," Mr Casey told AAP on Wednesday.
"She's been in just about every pub from Rocky to Cairns. We've got photos of her propped up at a bar in Proserpine when she was about seven feet long."
These days the now three-metre croc is confined to a specially designed pen next to Mr Casey's Proserpine home.
But he fears she'll be taken away after the state government issued him with a long list of demands if he wants to keep Charlie at home.
Mr Casey says he was trying to do the right thing when he applied to have his father's permit to keep Charlie transferred into his name after his recent death.
But he says the government only issued him with a temporary, 12-month permit and Charlie will be relocated unless he meets an onerous set of demands.
He insists there's no way Charlie can get out of her existing enclosure, which is three metres high, enclosed in reinforced mesh and surrounded by concrete walls to ensure she can't dig her way out.
"That pen was made to a plan supplied by parks and wildlife," he said. "There was never a problem before, but suddenly there's one now."
He says the government seems to be concerned about a caravan park situated next to his home, about 50 metres from Charlie's pen.
"But the caravan park was built in 1985 and the pen was built in 1987. Now it's a problem?"
Climate Change and Sustainability Minister Kate Jones says she feels for Mr Casey but he must address legitimate safety concerns.
"That's why he's been granted a 12-month permit to keep Charlie but with conditions related to public safety and the crocodile's welfare," she said in a statement.
Mr Casey must show that there's a proper enclosure, that he has the capacity to catch Charlie if she gets out, and is properly looking after her health.
If that happens, authorities will consider renewing his permit when it expires in October next year, Ms Jones said.
But Mr Casey says the timeframe for some of the conditions will expire in just a few weeks and he's engaged a lawyer to take the matter to the Queensland Civil and Administrative Tribunal.
"One of the silly things they want me to do is put signs up all around that say 'Danger Crocodiles Keep Out'. Anyone in that caravan park is just going to say 'oh there's a croc, let's go and have a look'."
Mr Casey fears his beloved, "docile" Charlie will end up at a crocodile farm.
"She's always had an enclosure of her own," he said. "If they try to put her in with another croc, she'll either kill or be killed.
"I feed her, I look after her water, I look after everything in her pen. She comes when I call her name and I can actually pat her. It'll be devastating if she's taken away."

description.hltext_display: Obama To Sign Repeal Of Don't Ask, Don't Tell
description.content: [WASHINGTON] - President Obama signs historic legislation Wednesday repealing the longstanding policy barring gays and lesbians from serving openly in the U.S. military. The controversial policy, known as "Don't Ask, Don't Tell," has been in effect for 17 years. It comes to an end after a comprehensive Pentagon study predicted minimal impact from ending the policy. Repeal is seen as a major legislative victory for the President and congressional Democrats and was supported by Defense Secretary Robert Gates and Admiral Mike Mullen, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff.

description.hltext_display: Die Vaganzo® GmbH geht eine neue Kooperation im Network Marketing ein.
description.content: PresseMitteilung von eVisionTeam GbR Durch die Kooperation mit der Firmengruppe eVisionTeam® für das Network Marketing Geschäft kann sich die Vaganzo® GmbH strategisch neu ausrichten und sich ganz auf den Vertrieb im klassischen Außendienst konzentrieren. (firmenpresse) - Die Vaganzo® GmbH ist einer der Marktführer in Europa für die Herstellung von Maßbekleidung für die Dame und den Herrn. Bisher wurde der Vertrieb ausschließlich über das sogenannte Network Marketing betrieben. Dabei wurde nicht nur auf beste Verarbeitung und feinste Stoffe geachtet. Ganz wichtig war und ist ein Leistungs-/Preisverhältnis, das seines gleichen sucht.Aus marktstrategischen Gründen wird die Vaganzo® GmbH zum 01.01.2011 die eigene Vertriebsform Network Marketing verlassen und das Unternehmen strategisch neu ausrichten, über den klassischen Außendienst. Der neue Direktvertrieb der Vaganzo® GmbH wird über die Hauptverwaltung in Krefeld, Zentrale für Europa und Übersee, gesteuert.Die bisherige Vertriebsform Network Marketing soll aber auch weiter angeboten werden und deshalb freut sich die Vaganzo® GmbH bekannt zu geben, speziell für diesen Bereich ein Unternehmen gefunden und mit ihm einen Kooperationsvertrag geschlossen zu haben, das ebenfalls seit Jahren im Network Marketing erfolgreich tätig ist.Die Firmengruppe eVisionTeam® wurde am 13. Januar 1999 in Hamburg gegründet und führt heute von London aus seine Vertriebsstrukturen in 28 Ländern und beliefert seine Kunden mit innovativen und sehr hochwertigen Produkten.Beide Unternehmen, so Burkhard Aden, Geschäftsführer der Vaganzo® GmbH und Robert Schmalohr, Gründer der Firmengruppe eVisionTeam®, freuen sich auf diese Zusammenarbeit. Besonders die Herausforderungen einer immer globalisierteren Welt kann durch diese Kooperation besser begegnet werden. Dadurch wird die Maßbekleidung von Vaganzo® nicht nur noch mehr Menschen zugänglich gemacht, sondern durch die Konzentration auf die Kernkompetenzen, wird das Produktangebot im Laufe der Zeit erheblich erweitert werden. Unternehmensinformation / Kurzprofil:Die Firmengruppe eVisionTeam® wurde am 13. Januar 1999 in Hamburg gegründet und ist heute in 28 Ländern durch Vertriebspartnerinnen und Vertriebspartner vertreten, die den Kunden mit innovativen und sehr hochwertigen Produkten beliefern. Hierbei wird darauf geachtet, dass die Produkte nachhaltig und / oder langlebig sind. In einzelnen Bereichen wird mit Produkten gearbeitet die jeden Tag erneut unter Beweis stellen, dass Ökologie und Ökonomie keinen Widerspruch darstellen müssen. Andere Produkte bedeuten einen echten Mehrwert, vereinfachen oder verbessern die Lebenssituation und durch die Vielfalt im Produktsortiment kann bei vielen Kunden ein bereits bestehender Bedarf geweckt werden, was gleichzeitig zu einem sicheren und anhaltendem Absatz der Produkte und somit zu einem soliden Geschäftsaufbau führt. Weitere Infos zur Pressemeldung:http://evisionteam.dePresseKontakt / Agentur:eVisionTeam GbR Robert Schmalohr Am Fuhrenkamp 22 21376 Salzhausen schmalohr(at)evisionteam.de 040-18003911 http://evisionteam.de Anmerkungen: 319690

description.hltext_display: Mustangs wrestling: Senior dedication
description.content:
By CLINT ROBUS - Star-Tribune staff writer trib.com | Posted: Wednesday, December 22, 2010 12:00 am | Loading…
Font Size:
As much as Natrona County's dual match with Riverton was about honoring its current senior wrestlers, Tuesday's dual was just as much about honoring the one senior wrestler who couldn't attend.
"Clay Myers was like one of my best friends," NC senior Ab Brown said. "I really wanted to get [a win], because we dedicated [the match] to him.
"That was a big thing."
Myers, who wrestled last season, died in a car crash last April. After the Mustangs had introduced the senior wrestlers prior to the start of Tuesday's Class 4A West Conference tussle against the Wolverines, they dedicated the match to their former teammate who would've been a senior this year.
Then Natrona capped the dedication with a 53-20 win over Riverton in a match the Mustangs controlled from the start.
Sandwiched between two Riverton forfeits, NC senior Brandon Kussy got things started at 112 pounds with a pin of Gavin Wilson in 2 minutes, 25 seconds.
Riverton responded with wins in three of the next five matches -- a pin, a win by technical fall and a decision -- to narrow the gap to 30-14.
But the Mustangs responded with wins in five of the final six matches, all featuring senior wrestlers. Riverton's TJ Galey pinned Dakota Webb in 4:50 at 171 pounds to prevent all of NC's seniors earning victories.
After a tough month of competition that included stops at tournaments in Rapid City, S.D., and Greeley, Colo., Natrona coach Scott Russell said the Mustangs are still banged up and have guys wrestling a little out of position.
But he's pleased with where the team is heading into the winter break.
"To be competing like we are, I'm real happy that each week we're getting better," Russell said. "We're still making mistakes, we still have to correct them, but right now we're happy.
"We'll be even more happier in January when we get some more of our injured guys back in the lineup and we get people down in weight."
Like Brown, for instance.
The senior has been wresting up a class at 189 pounds, with junior Caleb Seghetti coming back from a knee injury. It didn't slow Brown down much on Tuesday, though. He pinned Riverton junior Drew Leach in just 16 seconds.
Fellow senior Chase Cimburek followed with a pin of Dylan Lewis in 54 seconds at 215 pounds, and Andrew Marcelli capped the night with a 7-2 decision over Dawson Steeds at 285.
But Brown's quick pin pulled the momentum back in Natrona's favor.
"I wanted to get it going for the bigger guys," Brown said.
And for Clay.
Contact sports reporter Clint Robus at clint.robus@trib.com or (307) 266-0615. Read his blog at trib.com/epreps
Natrona County 53, Riverton 20

Casey Brown, 4-3. 152: Caleb Rhoades, NC, maj. dec. Rudy Batista, 14-1. 160: Jake Homer, NC, maj. dec. Jesse Olson, 14-3. 171: TJ Galey, Riv, pinned Dakota Webb, 4:50. 189: Ab Brown, NC, pinned Drew Leach, :16. 215: Chase Cimburek, NC, pinned Dylan Lewis, :54. 285: Andrew Marcelli, NC, dec. Dawson Steeds, 7-1.

description.hltext_display: 今日冬至 别忘吃饺子
description.content:
本报讯 （滕跃 首席记者 姬娜 实习生刘蕾）昨日，古城最高气温15．5℃，创近50年历史同比极值。今日冬至，白昼最短，黑夜最长，我省进入数九寒天，勿忘吃饺子。明日起，冷天气来临，我省最高降10℃，西安降6℃。而后天西安有望迎来今冬首场雪。
今天是“冬至”节气，按照《中国天文年历》，今年冬至准确时间为22日7：38。这是地球赤道以北地区白昼最短，黑夜最长的一天。进入冬至节气后，太阳开始北移，白昼将越来越长，也开始进入冬季最寒冷的时节，俗称“三九”，数九寒天即将开始。我国民间有“冷在三九，热在三伏”的说法。
冬至也是中华民族的一个传统节日。在这一天，北方大部分地区有吃饺子、吃馄饨的习俗，有“冬至吃碗饺子，冬天不冻耳朵”的说法，据说是因为纪念“医圣”张仲景冬至舍药留下的。南方则吃米团、汤圆、长线面、冬至团等。
据最新气象资料分析，今晚到明天陕北阴间多云，关中阴大部分地方有小雨或雨夹雪，陕南阴有小雨或雨夹雪，24日陕北多云间阴天，关中阴天雨夹雪转小雪，秦岭山区有中到大雪，局部有暴雪，陕南雨夹雪转小到中雪，南部局地有暴雪。关中、陕南日平均气温下降6－8℃。预计24日西安阴有小雪，气温大幅下降，在－2℃到2℃之间。

description.hltext_display: Fight looms after Texas gets 4 new US House seats
description.author: JAY ROOT
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account.
"A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process."
The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.
Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats.
"It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said.
Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves.
Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act.
Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process.
Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats.
South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada.
Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats.
"The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population."
Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes.

description.hltext_display: Tennessee Vols suffer third straight loss
description.content:
KNOXVILLE -- Another last-second missed shot meant another heartbreaking loss for the Tennessee men's basketball team Tuesday night.
Vols freshman Tobias Harris misfired on a 3-point attempt at the buzzer after UT came out of a timeout with 3.5 seconds remaining.
The Southern Cal Trojans marched out of Thompson-Boling Arena with their first road win of the season, 65-64, before a stunned crowd of 19,030.
"It was a very disappointing loss,’’ said Vols Coach Bruce Pearl, who has lost three consecutive games for the second time in his six-year tenure and the first time in nearly four years.

description.hltext_display: 中國現代農業將重點建設六大區域
description.content: “十二五”時期，中國發展現代農業，將重點� 強糧食主產區、特色農產品優勢區、大城市郊區農業區等6個區域建設。“十二五”時期，中國發展現代農業，將重點� 強糧食主產區、特色農產品優勢區、大城市郊區農業區等6個區域建設。據新華社12月22日� �導，作為“十二五”時期建設現代農業的重大舉措，中國農業部將進一步優化生產力布局，重點� 強糧食主產區等6個區域建設。 這是記者從22日召開的全國農業工作會上得到的消息。6大區域包括：糧食主產區建設。這是現代農業建設的重點推進區。主要包括新增千億斤糧食生產能力規劃確定的800個糧食生產大縣（農� �）。“十二五”時期，要突出基礎設施建設，優化品種結構，大力發展產地初� 工和精深� 工，提高綜合生產能力。特色農產品優勢區建設。這是保障重要農產品供應的主體區域。包括棉花、油菜、甘蔗、生豬等12種大宗農產品44個優勢區，以及西部地區特色農業區。“十二五”時期，要推動規模化種養、標準化生產、產業化經營、品牌化銷售，強化質量安全監管，提高資源利用率和� 工轉化率。大城市郊區農業區建設。主要包括直轄市、省會城市和計劃單列市郊區。“十二五”時期，要� 強“菜園子”和肉蛋奶、水產品生產基地建設，增強“菜籃子”產品供給能力。發展都市農業。東部沿海農業區建設。主要包括� 三角、長三角、環渤海、海峽西岸經濟區等東部沿海發達地區。“十二五”時期，要穩定發展糧食生產，� 快發展高效農業，提高農業效益。農墾經濟區建設。主要包括新疆生產建設兵團和黑龍江農墾、廣東農墾等19個大型集團化墾區和其他大型國有農� �。“十二五”時期，要建設成為國家商品糧和棉花、天然橡� 供給重點保障區、主要農產品� 工和良種繁育基地，帶動周邊地區發展。草原生態經濟區建設。主要包括北方和青藏高原草原地區，� �心是264個牧區半牧區縣（市、旗）。“十二五”時期，要� 強生態環境保護和建設，建立生態補償機制，促進草畜平衡，發展生態畜牧業。農業部部長韓長賦當天在全國農業工作會議上說，2010年中國農業農村經濟立足全年抗災奪豐收，取得了超出� �期的好成績，保持了農業農村經濟平穩較快發展的好勢� �，為經濟社會發展全局提供了重要支撐。韓長賦表示，今年中央出臺強農� 農政策數量之多、針對性之強、含金量之高都是多年少有的，農業部門爭取和落實政策力度之大、速度之快、效果之好也是多年少有的。韓長賦說，糧食連續第7年增產是今年經濟工作的最大亮點，� �計糧食總產10928億斤，比上年增� 312億斤，再創歷史新高，實現半個世紀以來首次連續7年增產。此外，農產品質量安全保持較高水平，蔬菜、畜產品、水產品監測合� �率分別為96.8%、99.6%和96.7%，全年未發生重大農產品質量安全事件。(徐志嬌 編輯) 免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。世華財訊資訊中心：editor@shihua.com.cn 電話：010-58022299轉235

description.hltext_display: 华富新闻：麦格理维持神华「跑赢大市」评级
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
麦格理发表研究报告指出，中国神华(01088)向母公司收购对盈利产生影响轻微，维持该股「跑赢大市」的评级，并予目标价38.5元。
麦格理称，神华向母公司神华集团收购绅宝和包头两个煤矿项目，预计对盈利产生轻微作用，主要由于该两煤矿较现有神华持有煤矿的质素较低，其中每吨纯利为12.18元人民币至97.9元，较神华现有煤矿每吨纯利170元低，该行估计新收购项目2011年至2012年盈利贡献为4.5亿元，而收购价相当于市盈率4.7倍至12.6倍。
- 华富财经 quamnet.com / jy Quam News
华富财经新闻
网址 : www.quamnet.com 如欲观看更多，请按这连结 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: Evacuations Ordered In Southern California
description.content: [LOS ANGELES] - Hundreds of homes in Los Angeles County are under evacuation orders tonight as the rain continues to fall across Southern California. With soil in the area completely saturated, authorities say homes in the La Canada [[ la-CAN-yada Flintridge area are in extreme danger of being swamped by mudslides. L.A. County Fire Department Deputy Chief Mike Metro says he "can't over emphasize the magnitude" of the storm, while forecasters are predicting more rainfall than the area has seen in a decade.

description.hltext_display: 鄭州強麥指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
Lighty's big night leads Ohio State in rout
description.content:
North Carolina-Asheville's Jon Nwannunu (35) has his shot blocked by Ohio State's William Buford (44) as David Lighty (23) helps defend during the first half of an NCAA college basketball game Tuesday in Columbus.
Yellow Pages
Find whatever you're looking for
with Totally Local Yellow Pages
Search provided by local.com
COLUMBUS —
There was no complicated reason why David Lighty was so hot.
He was just open.
Lighty scored 13 of No. 2 Ohio State’s first 16 points and sat out most of the second half while finishing with 29 points to lead the Buckeyes past UNC Asheville 96-49 on Tuesday night.
“I was knocking them down,” he said. “I’m not sure what (defense) they really started in but I was wide open at the beginning of the game. I just started feeling good after I hit the first one.”
Lighty, who came in averaging 11.6 points, had 23 at halftime. He left with 10:23 left — one point shy of his career high — and did not return.
“We made some shots early and Dave was rolling,” Ohio State coach Thad Matta said. “Honestly, I think we just took advantage of what they were giving us.”
William Buford added 14 points, Deshaun Thomas 13 and Jared Sullinger added nine points and 16 rebounds for the Buckeyes (11-0).
J.D. Primm had 15 points, D.J. Cunningham 13 and Chris Stephenson 11 for the Bulldogs (5-6).
Lighty hadn’t hit double figures in his past four games but had that covered in the opening 2:45.
“I honestly felt Lighty was their best player,” Asheville coach Ed Biedenbach said. “We elected to try to point him in our zone. What we did was we turned him loose to show that he was one of the best players around.”
He almost outscored the Bulldogs in the opening half by himself. He hit 9 of 12 shots from the field including 5 of 7 3-pointers as the Buckeyes led 48-24.
Down 26 points in the opening half, the Bulldogs scored 10 of the first 12 points in the second half to pull to 50-34, but then Lighty made a 3 and the Buckeyes were off and running again.
Asheville fell to 0-12 against Big Ten teams. The Bulldogs have played eight of their 11 games on the road, including an 80-69 loss at No. 24 North Carolina on Nov. 23 and an 87-72 defeat at No. 16 Georgetown on Nov. 27.
Over its past four games, Ohio State has had three different players score at least 29 points. First Sullinger set an Ohio State freshman record when he had 40 points against IUPUI, then two games later Jon Diebler tied the school record with nine 3-pointers in scoring 29. And now Lighty.
“That’s how our season’s been going so far,” Lighty said. “There’s not one person you can key on.”
Biedenbach said he didn’t have much choice but to lay off Lighty.
“It’s an old cliche of coaches, which I don’t particularly like, but you have to pick your poison,” he said. “They’re that good. You can’t just go out there and play them straight up when you’re UNC Asheville and expect to win the game.”
The 23-year-old Lighty is the Buckeyes’ elder statesman. He came in with the “Thad Five” in the fall of 2006, a recruiting class that included three players (Greg Oden, Mike Conley Jr. and Daequan Cook) who would be taken in the first round of the NBA draft after their freshman season.
He missed most of the 2008-9 season with a broken bone in his foot, had his finest season a year ago and then re-broke a bone in the same foot this past spring, requiring more rehab.
The fifth-year senior from Cleveland was making his 99th start. He’s played at Ohio State with six first-round draft picks, played in the 2007 NCAA title game and his teams have won 106 games in which he’s played — just five off the school mark.
Lighty’s previous career high came 364 days earlier on Dec. 22, 2009, against Cleveland State.
“Maybe I’m happy to go home,” he said with a wide grin. “I’m not sure what it is. But I’m just happy we got a win and we almost put 40 minutes together.”
Against Asheville, he set career highs for field goals made (11), 3-pointers made (seven) and attempted (10) and he matched his most field goals attempted (16).
“They opened in a triangle-and-two (against Sullinger),” Matta said. “(Our guys) found him. He was the open guy. He kind of got rolling there. He did a good job of driving it. Once again, we did a good job of moving the basketball tonight, finding open guys.”
Asheville’s John Nwannunu suffered an injury in the final minutes and was helped to the dressing room.

event_or_fact.property: he didn?t have much choice but to lay off Lighty

description.hltext_display: New Vanderbilt coach won't tip hand
description.content:
New football Coach James Franklin addressed how he's going to hire a staff, his former boss' departure at Maryland and his perspective on Vanderbilt's academic standards Tuesday.
Franklin said he would not announce his staff until it is complete. But Kansas State Coach Bill Snyder announced Tuesday that Ricky Rahne will move from the Wildcats tight ends coach to the Commodores quarterbacks coach, according to the Kansas City Star.
Franklin and Rahne worked together at Kansas State from 2006-07. Franklin would not say whether he had hired Rahne.
"He's a guy that I have a tremendous relationship with, known a long time, brilliant, played quarterback at Cornell," Franklin said. "What I'm trying to do is surround myself with as many talented people as I possibly can, and he's a guy I have a background with."
Franklin said he might not announce his staff during the bowl season.
"There's a lot of guys in bowl games right now," Franklin said. "I'm going to take my time and do it the right way."
He will hire an offensive coordinator, but he plans to have plenty of input on the offense.
"To me the defensive coordinator position is an important one, and it's critical, especially with my background on offense," said Franklin, who was offensive coordinator at Maryland. "There's people that I have been in contact with. As soon as (the defensive coordinator) comes together then everything else will fall in place."
Franklin said he planned to meet later Tuesday with some of the assistants at Vanderbilt who served on the former staff under Robbie Caldwell.
"I've been talking with some of those guys throughout this process," Franklin said. "I'd be a hypocrite if I didn't. I was a guy that got held over at Maryland. I was with Ron Vanderlinden for a year and then Ralph (Friedgen) came in and kept me on."
Franklin said he has spoken with Friedgen and some in the administration at Maryland but not about Friedgen's firing Monday. Franklin had been designated the coach in waiting at Maryland.
"I thanked them for their support and everything they've been able to do for me these last 10 years," Franklin said.
When asked about Friedgen being forced out, Franklin said, "My focus now is at Vanderbilt and all the opportunities that we have here."
Franklin's contact with recruits has been mostly limited to phone calls because a dead period in recruiting began Monday and lasts until Jan. 3.
He expects no concessions from Vanderbilt's admissions department when it comes to academic standards.
"There is going to be a very unique population across this country that is going to be attracted to come into a place like Vanderbilt," Franklin said.
"I couldn't be more excited about finding those players, and I know talking to kids right now, they couldn't be more excited to come here for those reasons — to get a world class education and play in the best college football league in the country."

description.hltext_display: UConn women streak to record win
description.content:
HARTFORD, Conn. - Men's teams. Women's teams. No. 89 belongs to UConn. It beats them all.
The No. 1-ranked Huskies women's basketball team topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State, 93-62, last night.
Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark - and would have made Wooden proud - Connecticut blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2 1/2 years.
Maya Moore had a double-double with a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds and Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn - Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up signs with "89" and the Huskies logo on them. A couple of other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs." After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. "I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA," coach Geno Auriemma said. "This is Connecticut, and that's good enough." It is one more chapter of history for UConn, and perhaps the grandest.
Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women's game. The Huskies already own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
The streak, though, takes it to another level, certainly raising the profile of women's basketball and maybe all of women's athletics.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game. "My grandfather would have been thrilled," the 47-year-old Wooden said. " He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team. He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level - and it wasn't by the men." John Wooden, the beloved Wizard of Westwood, died June 4 at age 99.
There was a festive atmosphere throughout the city, where building lights gleamed blue and white, and it was as electric as any Final Four inside the arena. Charles and UConn men's star Kemba Walker sat behind the Huskies' bench, and football coach Randy Edsall was there, too. Former NFL star Warrick Dunn, meanwhile, was cheering for his alma mater, Florida State.
With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-America had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore's fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.

event_or_fact.property: I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA; This is Connecticut, and that's good enough.

description.hltext_display: Drug War Threatens Mexico-U.S. Produce Trade
description.content: [MEXICO CITY] - Escalating drug violence in Mexico is threatening American companies that import fresh fruits and vegetables. U.S. quality inspectors from Arizona recently pulled out of Mexico fearing for their lives as violent acts continue to escalate. Hundreds of inspections will now be done on the U.S. side of the border, rather than in Nogales, Mexico. The Agriculture Department says mostly tomatoes and grapes were inspected in Nogales.

description.hltext_display: Peterson, Razorbacks look to cure turnover woes
description.author: KURT VOIGT/None
description.content:
Arkansas coach John Pelphrey didn't hesitate in identifying the reason for the overtime loss to No. 25 Texas A&M over the weekend.
The Razorbacks (7-2) committed 24 turnovers and went down 71-62 in their second overtime loss of the season. The miscues have been a problem for Arkansas, which has more turnovers than assists this season despite a strength of schedule that ranks 297th in the country.
It's an issue the Razorbacks hope to fix quickly as they close in on Southeastern Conference play. To do so, they'll need more steady play from point guard Jeff Peterson.
Peterson, who sat out last season after transferring from Iowa, committed six turnovers and had no assists against the Aggies. The junior has more turnovers (22) than assists (21) in nine games this season, a far cry from the 1.34-to-1 assist-to-turnover ratio he had as a sophomore with the Hawkeyes.
"I think we're going to have to work at it and get better," Pelphrey said. "I think he's getting back in the rhythm of playing. I think all of us at times try to do a little too much with the ball. Maybe that's it. He'll play better. He'll take care of the basketball."
Arkansas led by as many as 10 points in the second half against Texas A&M, but the Aggies scored 14 points off Razorbacks' turnovers to rally and send the game into overtime. Peterson led Arkansas with six turnovers, while guards Rickey Scott, Rotnei Clarke and Julysses Nobles had three each.
"We're overhandling the ball a little bit and it's not just those guys," freshman Mardracus Wade said. "It's some of the big men, too, and we've got to correct that."
The lack of playmaking from Peterson has been particularly difficult to overcome for a team with five newcomers that is still searching for leadership. Peterson started 25 games as a sophomore at Iowa, averaging 10.6 points and 4.2 assists overall and improving to 11.6 points and 4.9 assists in Big Ten games.
This season, the junior is averaging 2.2 assists while adjusting to Pelphrey's style and being looked at to replace former Arkansas point guard Courtney Fortson, who left the team after last season.
"He's not going to lose confidence," Wade said. "I think it is still a learning process for him. At Iowa, it was more of a slowdown offense, run it to perfection. Here, we're more of a running, get up and down quick (offense), so I think he's still trying to get used to the pace of the game plan here.
"But I think he's getting used to it and as time goes on, he'll get better."
Pelphrey agreed. He said he wasn't sure if Peterson was pressing, but he said the guard's experience will pay off as he becomes more comfortable on the court.
"I'm sure he wants to do well," Pelphrey said. "I'm sure he puts pressure on himself to do well. He's played well at times. It's a long season. He'll have some good games going forward. He'll probably have some bad games going forward."I would say he's got confidence in making plays he needs to make at this level to be effective for a team."
The Razorbacks host Texas Southern (2-7) on Wednesday night.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日晚深市上市公司公告速递
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
更新中：
（000692）惠天热电(000692,股吧)：关于转让参股公司房联股份公司27.87%股权挂牌结果的公告
日前，公司将持有的参股公司―沈阳房联股份有限公司（以下简称“沈阳房联”）27.87% 的股权（共计660万股）在沈阳联合产权交易所挂牌寻求意向受让方的形式进行转让（详见2010年10月12日刊登在《中国证券报》、《证券时报》和巨潮资讯网上的2010-40号公告）。 2010年12月21日，公司接到沈阳联合产权交易所的《挂牌结果通知书》，公司持有的沈阳房联股份有限公司27.87%股权，在沈阳联合产权交易所以3250万元（人民币）为底价，经过20个工作日挂牌，挂牌期间产生一个意向受让方，为沈阳房产实业投资发展有限公司。
（证券时报网快讯中心）

description.hltext_display: Côte d’Ivoire : Washington impose des restrictions de voyage à Laurent Gbagbo
description.content:
Les Etats-Unis ont imposé des restrictions aux déplacements du président ivoirien sortant Laurent Gbagbo et à ses proches en raison de son refus de céder le pouvoir à l''issue de l'élection présidentielle contestée du 28 novembre, a annoncé mardi le département d'Etat.
La secrétaire d'Etat Hillary Clinton a signé l'ordre de sanctions qui interdit les voyages aux Etats-Unis à Gbagbo et à des dizaines de ses partisans, a déclaré P.J. Crowley, porte-parole du département d'Etat.
"Cela impliquera potentiellement un nombre assez important de personnes, pas seulement le président lui-même, sa famille immédiate, mais aussi ceux qui sont ses ministres et ceux qui continuent à l'aider à rester au pouvoir", a dit Crowley.
L'Union européenne avait pris la veille des mesures similaires. Crowley a déclaré que les sanctions entraîneraient l'annulation des visas américains détenus par les personnes concernées et interdiraient que des visas leur soient délivrés à l'avenir.
Il a ajouté que les Etats-Unis envisageaient "activement" d'autres mesures qui pourraient inclure des sanctions financières.
La Maison blanche a apporté son soutien à Alassane Ouattara, rival de Gbagbo reconnu vainqueur du scrutin par la Commission électorale indépendante et par une grande partie de la communauté internationale.
Gbagbo a contesté les résultats du scrutin, en disant qu'ils étaient entachés de fraudes, et il a été déclaré élu par le Conseil constitutionnel.

description.hltext_display: 规范汉语环境正当其时
description.content:
新闻出版总署日前下发通知，要求在汉语出版物中，禁止出现随意夹带使用英文单词或字母缩写等外国语言文字；禁止生造非中非外、含义不清的词语；禁止任意增减外文字母、颠倒词序等违反语言规范现象。 早在4月，广电总局曾要求央视等媒体尽量屏蔽英语缩略词。例如NBA，必须称为“美国男子职业篮球联赛”。当时网友就说了：不让用NBA，先得把CCTV给改过来。新闻出版总署此次“禁缩令”指明针对汉语出版物领域，又引来一片非议。
在网络语言盛行的大环境下，这两则通知背后的行政理念都是为了遏制汉语使用乱象。
乍一听，这个“禁令”好像又是“没事找事”。细一想，却是很有必要，“禁止生造含义不清的词语”“禁止任意增减外文字母”，这样的规定并不是扼杀语言的生命力，而是为了净化语言文字的土壤，使其更规范的发展。
比如，近期网络神词“给力”火得一塌糊涂，网友用汉语拼音“geili”生造出英语单词“gelivable（给力）”，搞得老外一头雾水，大呼看不懂。
无论是汉语还是外语，动辄生造、自造词汇，貌似新鲜，实为荒唐。严格规范汉语出版物，并非不合时宜，而是适时之举。

description.hltext_display: 鄭州白糖指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
推FTA 經濟部：美澳紐優先
description.content:
〔中央社〕台灣積極與其他國家洽簽自由貿易協定（FTA）。經濟部次長梁國新今天說，經綜合考量，優先推動與美國、澳洲、紐西蘭、日本、東南亞國家及歐盟洽簽FTA或經合協議。
梁國新於立法院外交及國防委員會報告時說，決定洽簽FTA或經濟合作協議時，要考量雙邊貿易關係密切，有利台商拓展對外市場；是台灣重要投資夥伴，透過強化投資帶動貿易發展；有利確保台灣取得產業發展所需資源的貿易夥伴，還要有利台灣對外經貿關係整體布局。
因此，梁國新表示，綜合考量後，經濟部目前優先推動的目標對象包括美國、澳洲、紐西蘭、日本、東南亞國家及歐盟。
列席報告的外交部次長沈呂巡表示，依據世界貿易組織（WTO）統計，目前共有207個自由貿易協定生效實施，亞太地區就多達82個，可見東亞區域經貿合作蓬勃。
但因洽簽FTA耗時，中國國民黨籍立法委員周守訓建議，台灣加入「跨太平洋戰略經濟夥伴協定」（TPP）比簽署FTA容易，要加入TPP，可從美國著手，因為美國也不希望台灣被邊緣化；另外，新加坡及紐西蘭對台灣友善，也有意願與台灣加強合作，也是嘗試管道之一。
TPP談判成員包括新加坡、智利、汶萊、紐西蘭、美國、澳洲、越南、秘魯、馬來西亞9國。

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生
description.content:
〔中央社〕受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。
香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。
國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。
另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。
香港旅遊業議會表示，香港至今仍有9個旅行團滯留在歐洲，涉及人數170人，其中4個團約100人滯留在倫敦，其餘5個團分別滯留在布拉格及巴塞隆納等城市。

description.hltext_display: 洪一峰經典作品 府音樂會再現
description.content:
〔中央社〕當杜鵑花遇上思慕的人，會譜出怎樣的音樂篇章？25日登場的總統府音樂會將在國樂伴奏下，由歌手許景淳、洪榮宏分別演唱已故音樂人黃友棣、洪一峰經典作品，感受不一樣音樂會。
總統府今天下午舉行記者會，公布25日音樂會演出細節。總統府公共事務室主任陳永豐說，總統馬英九25日晚間將出席音樂會，致贈紀念牌給黃友棣的學生和洪榮宏，藉此表彰黃友棣、洪一峰兩名音樂前輩用音符記錄時代的貢獻。
這場音樂會有別於過去以管絃室內樂的形式，改由台灣國家國樂團擔綱，主題為「鄉音雅韻˙絲竹傳情」，受邀者僅150人，主要為長期從事地方文化發展的志工、社區營造工作者代表。
演出曲目也別出心裁，串織客家山歌、原民樂舞、台語歌謠之外，還有改編的流行歌曲「九百九十九朵玫瑰」，以及應景的「耶誕鈴聲」。
黃友棣的代表作品「杜鵑花」將由許景淳演繹，洪榮宏也將連續唱出「思慕的人」、「淡水暮色」等膾炙人口的台語經典歌謠。
陳永豐說，音樂會25日晚間6時在總統府大禮堂舉行，民眾在節目結束後，晚間11時可透過公共電視台收看這場音樂會，一起聆聽美妙的樂音。

description.hltext_display: 都更槍殺案 被控教唆的建設公司� 責人無罪
description.content:
〔記者楊國文／台北報導〕北市正義國宅都更槍擊命案中，檢方起訴龍聯建設負責人葉松年，因不滿正義國宅住戶代表王克強延後都市更新合建案，涉嫌教唆龍聯副總、外甥沈宗基槍殺王克強，一審判沈宗基無期徒刑，葉松年無罪，高等法院今天依殺人罪改判沈宗基15年徒刑，葉松年則因證據不足仍判無罪。全案可上訴。
檢方指控，龍聯公司投資台北市大安區正義大樓都市更新合建案，長達13年，王克強是正義大樓住戶代表，熟悉都市更新相關法規細節，也以2億元將國宅裡的2間公寓賣給葉松年，但王克強卻擬引進其它建商，跟龍聯對抗。
葉松年不滿王克強拿了錢還攪局，導致龍聯建設無法順利收購國宅進行都更案，承擔銀行貸款壓力，財力吃緊，不滿王克強老是跟公司抗衡，合建案已延宕多時，葉涉嫌教唆沈宗基殺害王克強，王克強頭部遭槍擊，送醫急救後不幸死亡。
檢方偵查後將葉、沈兩人起訴並具體求處無期徒刑。

description.hltext_display: North State Notebook: Section wrestlers dot state rankings
description.author: Kevin Askeland
description.content:
The California Wrestler website has come out with its December, state rankings and six Northern Section wrestlers have made the grade.
Nashon Garrett of Chico is ranked No. 1 in the state at 112 pounds. A state champion last year at 103 pounds, Garrett has already lost to one north-state wrestler this year. That would be Orland’s Hermilo Esquivel, who is ranked No. 3 in the state at 119 pounds.
Garrett and Esquivel wrestled in a dual meet between Orland and Chico last week. The top two teams from last season, Orland defeated Chico in a dual last year but the Panthers won the section championship. Esquivel defeated Garrett in the dual meet last year and also at the NorCal Classic.
Esquivel won last week’s match 7-5 to give Orland the 26-22 dual meet win.
Other ranked wrestlers include Chase Boontjer of Foothill, seventh at 140 pounds; Josh Dye of Central Valley, 7th at 145 pounds; Dillon Reid of Red Bluff, 5th at 160 pounds; and Cody Linton of Winters, 7th at 160 pounds.
The CIF State Bowl Games saw a shift in power over the weekend as four teams from Northern California won championships.
Palo Alto and Folsom both upset nationally ranked teams, with Palo Alto topping Centennial of Corona 15-13 and Folsom routing Serra of Gardena 48-20. Escalon, meanwhile, blasted Madison 30-14, and De La Salle of Concord won its third state title with a 48-8 blasting of nationally ranked Servite of Anaheim.
Northern California previously had won four state bowl games in the five-year history of the event. Southern California still holds the overall edge 13-8.
The Enterprise Hornets had their long string of football playoff appearances snapped this year. Could a similar situation happen in boys basketball?
The Hornets have won four straight Division III section championships, and they have been in the finals five straight years. In fact, the 2005 season is the only time since 1994 that the Hornets haven’t reached the section championship game. During that run, the Hornets have won 11 section titles.
However, this year Enterprise is off to a 4-5 start including a pair of losses to Northern Section Division III schools. The Hornets fell behind early against the Foothill Cougars at the Harlan Carter Tournament in the third-place game, 64-58, and then lost to Paradise 51-42 in the second round of the Red Bluff Tournament.
Paradise is off to one of its best starts in years with a 5-1 record while Foothill is 6-3. Corning, playing mostly Division IV schools early in the season, is 7-4 while Enterprise is fourth in the division in winning percentage at 4-5.
On the girls’ side, Division III might just be the most competitive division in the Northern Section this year. While Paradise is currently the runaway favorite with a 12-0 record to start the season, there does not appear to be any weak teams in the division.
Corning has the worst record out of the six teams in the division at 7-5 while Oroville is 6-4 and Enterprise and Las Plumas are both 4-2. Foothill is just above the latter two schools with a 5-2 record. Paradise already has blowout wins against Corning and Enterprise, but Las Plumas gave the Bobcats their toughest game of the season in a 47-43 loss.
Northern Section Basketball Rankings
Boys
Division II: 1. Chico 9-1, 2. Pleasant Valley 6-1, 3. Shasta 7-2.
Division III: 1. Paradise 5-1, 2. Foothill 6-3, 3. Enterprise 4-5.
Division IV: 1. West Valley 5-4, 2. Central Valley 7-3, 3. Anderson 5-6.
Division V: 1. Liberty 5-2, 2. Trinity 7-0, 3. Chester 10-1.
Division VI: 1. Westwood 8-1, 2. Mercy 4-4, 3. Maxwell 4-3.

description.hltext_display: Côte d’Ivoire : Laurent Gbagbo, sourd aux appels, réaffirme être le président
description.content:
Laurent Gbagbo a réaffirmé mardi soir lors d''une intervention à la télévision d'Etat ivoirienne (RTI) qu'il avait remporté l'élection présidentielle et a invité un "comité d'évaluation" international à venir vérifier la validité des résultats du scrutin du 28 novembre.
Ce comité dirigé par un représentant de l'Union africaine comprendrait des représentants de la Cedeao, de l'UA, de la Ligue arabe, des Nations unies, des Etats-Unis, de l'Union européenne, de la Russie et de la Chine, a-t-il précisé.
Laurent Gbagbo, qui refuse de quitter le pouvoir après le second tour remporté, selon la communauté internationale, par son rival Alassane Ouattara, subit des pressions de plus en plus fortes.
Selon lui, "la communauté internationale déclare la guerre à la Côte d'Ivoire". "Cela n'est pas acceptable et cela ne sera pas accepté", a-t-il mis en garde.Il a estimé que tôt ou tard, la force de l'Onu et le dispositif français Licorne "partiront" et a appelé le camp de son rival Alassane Ouattara à quitter l'hôtel d'Abidjan où il est actuellement retranché.
Des diplomates ont expliqué ne pas prendre au sérieux la déclaration du président sortant et ont précisé que ni les Etats-Unis, ni la France ou d'autres Etats n'ont été consultés. "Au fond, il ne s'agit que d'une stratégie pour gagner du temps. Gbagbo doit se soumettre à la décision des électeurs telle qu'elle a été certifiée", a dit un diplomate.
Les chefs d'Etat de la Cedeao doivent se retrouver pour un sommet vendredi dans la capitale nigériane, Abuja, pour discuter des derniers développements en Côte d'Ivoire.
Malgré les restrictions imposées par les Etats-Unis aux déplacements de plusieurs dirigeants ivoiriens et malgré un nouvel appel de la France pour exiger le départ de Gbagbo, ses partisans ne semblent rien vouloir lâcher sur le terrain.
La mission de l'Onuci apparaît de plus en plus délicate et dangereuse mais celle-ci va se poursuivre, a annoncé Alain Leroy, secrétaire général adjoint de l'Onu. Dans un entretien diffusé mardi par Lefigaro.fr, Alain Leroy explique que le camp Gbagbo fait tout pour couper l'approvisionnement des casques bleus en fioul et en nourriture. "Nous avons encore des réserves, mais la situation devient de plus en plus délicate et dangereuse" pour la force de l'Onu, affirme-t-il.
Pour le secrétaire général des Nations unies, Ban Ki-moon, les forces loyales à Laurent Gbagbo tentent d'imposer un blocus aux soldats de l'Onuci. Rendant compte devant l'Assemblée générale de l'Onu, Ban a demandé aux Etats membres des Nations unies de se préparer à contribuer à ce que les fournitures parviennent à l'Onuci, dont les hommes protègent notamment l'hôtel du Golf où est retranché Alassane Ouattara.
Lundi le Conseil de sécurité avait décidé de prolonger la mission des 10.000 casques bleus présents dans le pays. En dépit des tensions, un porte-parole de l'armée ivoirienne a annoncé à la télévision que le couvre-feu instauré juste après le second tour de la présidentielle sera levé mercredi. Selon l'Onu, au moins 50 personnes ont été tuées dans des violences et des centaines ont été blessées ou enlevées.

description.hltext_display: 大吊车娶亲也有味
description.content:
昨天9时许，在西安市?河西路，11辆大吊车组成的迎亲车队引得路人阵阵惊叹。据了解，新郎辛乔曾开过吊车，所以在结婚时想出了用吊车迎娶新娘的创意。
图为一对新人在“婚车”上秀甜蜜。本报记者 阮班慧摄
本报讯（首席记者 李永利 实习生 潘婷）
“看惯了用豪华轿车迎亲的，还从没见过用大吊车娶媳妇的，真是世上啥稀奇事都有。”12月21日上午，未央区赵村的胡大妈，笑呵呵地望着村民辛乔用吊车当头车，由11辆吊车组成的迎亲车队娶来的新娘，惊讶的这样说着。
昨天9时许，记者来到西安市?河西路时，11辆前挡风玻璃上均贴着大红“喜”字，车头上悬挂着大红花和彩色气球的大吊车，在喜庆的唢呐和锣鼓吹打声中，由北向南朝十里铺方向走来。这支迎亲车队壮观的场面引来路人驻足观看。一名小男孩搂着爷爷的脖子，指着迎亲队伍兴奋地说：“爷爷快看，大吊车，大吊车，它们要到哪里去？”爷爷笑着说，“它们要娶新媳妇去，你长大了用啥车娶媳妇呀？”小男孩用双手捂着眼睛，把头顶到爷爷的脖子上神秘地说：“羞，羞。”惹得旁边的人们哈哈大笑。迎亲队伍中的一名男子说：“这11辆大吊车每辆载重350吨，新郎以前是开吊车的，用吊车娶媳妇图个新鲜。”
随后，娶来新娘的迎亲车队从十里铺向西到达东二环路，接着朝北向辛家庙街道办事处的赵村浩浩荡荡地走去。新郎辛乔告诉记者，他以前是开吊车的，两年前经亲戚介绍，认识了新娘谢倩，初次见面就产生好感，随后便展开了恋爱。随着慢慢的了解，他们俩的感情越来越深。面临结婚时，他对谢倩说：“我一定要用一种别人从来没有用过的方式来迎娶你。”谢倩问他是啥方式？他为了给谢倩一种惊喜，一直保密。他这样做，就是要给新娘一个惊喜，给自己的婚礼留下美好的回忆，并且来证明自己对谢倩的爱和对工作的热爱。当他把自己的想法告诉单位领导时，领导立即答应，并表示非常支持，迎娶谢倩的这11辆大吊车都是他们公司免费给提供的。

description.hltext_display: Tennessee Lady Vols preview
description.content:
Where. Thompson Boling Arena, Knoxville
TV. SportSouth
Last meeting. UT 98, ETSU 39 (Jan. 8, 1986)
Story line. After beating Texas, losing to Baylor and beating Stanford in overtime, the Lady Vols moved up one spot to No. 5. Though separated by just 101 miles, UT and ETSU have not met in nearly 15 years. Lady Vols freshman Meighan Simmons is coming off back-to-back 20-point games and was named the SEC freshman of the week. ETSU senior guard Tara Davis scored 21 points in Monday's win over Campbell.

description.hltext_display: 鄭州早秈稻指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
Former Police Officer Headed To Prison
description.content: [MCALLEN] - Four years after his arrest, the former McAllen police officer, who also once led one of the Upper Valley's largest drug trafficking operations, is going to the big house. Francisco Meza-Rojas was sentenced Tuesday in McAllen federal court to 27 years in prison. The 45-year-old Meza-Rojas along with several of his brothers were indicted back in 2006 following a lengthy investigation into the family-run drug-running operation. But shortly after, he led a jailbreak from the East Hidalgo Detention Center in La Villa, and made it to Mexico, where he spent 3 years before authorities tracked him down.
